c74object.name: dynamic.request~
c74object.digest: Similar to an all-in-one dynamic.in~ and sah~
c74object.description: For a patcher loaded within a dynamicdsp~ or dynamicserial~ object, a non-zero signal input cause dynamic.request~ to update its output by fetching a value from the associated signal inlet. The value is then held until a new trigger is received. This allows efficient parameter updating in sample accurate processing applications.

objarg.name: initial-inlet
objarg.description:
Set the inial inlet to attach to when inside a dynamicdsp~ or dynamicserial~.
Default is 0 (off).

method.name: inlet
method.description: Sending an int to the first inlet sets the inlet to attach to when inside a dynamicdsp~ or dynamicserial~.

method.name: sample_and_hold
method.description: A non-zero trigger signal into dynamic.request~ will sample and hold the signal value from the selected inlet.

entry.name: signal
entry.description: Outputs the input from the correspoding inlet of the dynamicdsp~ or dynamicserial~ that dynamic.request~ is inside. The output is updated each time it recieves a non-zero trigger signal, making it function like sah~.
